link.description: I distilled and crafted a concise user guide for Nmap to assist both novice and experienced users, based on the in-depth Nmap documentation. Through this document, I exhibit my technical writing skills by providing clear, step-by-step instructions on the installation, usage, and troubleshooting of Nmap. The guide is structured to facilitate ease of use, with sections dedicated to practical examples and common issues, reflecting my ability to create content that effectively addresses user needs. Additionally, the guide includes my cover design work, creating an intuitive layout; integrating useful graphics demonstrates my holistic approach to technical documentation and user experience. Download the PDF version from the 'Get Started with Nmap' section
